p: Aminosilane (AmS) coated IONPs are widley used as a multifunctional drug delivery system. Surface modification of IONPs by AmS can indeed prevent aggregation and allows the addition of specific functionalities to IONPs [ 97, 98]. As for their biocompatibility, it has been shown that AmS-coated particles affected cell metabolic activity only at high concentrations (around 200 μg/mL), while leaving the membrane intact [ 97]. On the other hand, AmS-IONPs at concentrations above 200 μg/mL have been shown to reduce neuron viability by 50%, both in the presence or absence of a magnetic field [ 98].
